content:
Where can I file a bug report? My Isabelle 2025-2 crashed on my Ubuntu 22.04.5 LTS with this message on the terminal:

environment: line 1:  5788 Killed                  "$JAVA_HOME/bin/$PRG" "$@"

What could have caused this?
Serious problems should be forwarded to the mailing list but this just looks like the OOM killer ending the process to free up memory.
I did not use a very large development, why the Linux out of memory killer killed my process? With previous Isabelle versions this never happened.
